name: Metaword 003 // The Power of Words
description:
Sentences need structure

A singular subject needs a singular predicate.
A sentence needs to express a complete thought.

If a group of words does not have a subject and predicate, it's merely a phrase. 

Utility token based on the rules of English Grammar. To be burnt for access to giveaway and limited drops. 

The Rules of Grammar will have an initial run of 6 NFTs. 

If nothing else, it may help you better your command of the Queen's English. Thank you kind sir.
